author: senh
title: 12 amazingly quirky pods for campers
text: BING NEWS: 12 amazingly quirky pods for campers (CNN)It's camping, but not as you know it. UrbanCampsite Amsterdam, an open-air exhibition on an artificial island about 20 minutes outside the Dutch city, allows lovers of the great outdoors to sleep inside one of 12 quirky art installations created by ... 08/9/2015 - 11:10 pm | View Link 8 of Japan’s craziest, anti-loneliness attractions When I visited Tokyo last month, I made a beeline to the amazingly weird attractions the city is notorious for, such as Robot Restaurant (with live robot battles and sexy Japanese vixens ... cities that aren’t as quirky as Tokyo, such as Kyoto. 11/7/2014 - 9:53 am | View Link Museums, big or small, packed with information Amazingly detailed, intricate steam engines and locomotives include working pieces. Sure, some small museums are of the biggest-ball-of-twine variety, but those have their merits, too. A little quirky fun never hurt anyone. A wooden walkway leads campers up to the oval front door of the quirky tent ... it's also amazingly well designed and practical.
